H0.text: after how many years are the olympic games held. Every 4 years

H1.text: after how many years are the olympic games held. Annually

H2.text: after how many years are the olympic games held. Every 5 years

H3.text: after how many years are the olympic games held. Once every two years

A4.text: The Olympic Games have been staged every four years.

A5.text: Since 1994, they have alternated between the Summer and Winter Olympics every two years during the four-year Olympiad.

A6.text: The Summer Olympic Games, also known as the Summer Olympics or the Games of the Olympiad, is a major international multi-sport event normally held once every four years.
